short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Html5css3 drawing tool for web page graphics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Html5 and CSS3 web graphic drawing tools, with multi angle viewing graphics.
Easy to use, easy to start. Plugins run fast and take up less memory.
For drawing beginners can be very good training, improve the ability of drawing.
